title: S2: MF DOOM, Part 3 - Gas Face Genesis
description:
3rd Bass and KMD are now signed and music is flowing.  KMD, being recently signed to Elektra records starts to promote their debut album, Mr Hood.  Elektra Records in 1990 had one of the strongest hip hop rosters with artists like Del Tha Funky Homosapien, Leaders Of The New School, and Brand Nubian.  KMD hits the road and experiences life on the road. Some of their fellow Elektra records artists share their experiences of their time on the road with KMD, and their transformation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
